resource: 用户申请 接口 相关的API

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
申请使用的时限{one_month: 0,
                                    two_month: 1,
                                    three_month: 3,
                                    six_month: 4,
                                    one_year: 5,
                                    two_year: 6,
                                    three_year: 7
                                    }

requests.response_body:
{
  "id": 1,
  "state": "待审核",
  "range_alias": "一个月",
  "start_time": "2016-12-14",
  "end_time": "2017-01-14",
  "is_available": false,
  "created_at": "2016-12-14T14:41:57.372+08:00",
  "updated_at": "2016-12-14T14:41:57.372+08:00",
  "user_name": null,
  "interface_document_title": null,
  "url": "http://example.org/appointments/1.json"
}
requests.curl:
curl "http://smart-life.com//appointments" -d 'appointment[interface_document_id]=1&appointment[range]=one_month' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "X-User-Token: qwertyuiop" \
	-H "X-User-Phone: 13813813811" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" \
	-H "Cookie: "
